    AND `all_f`.`edm_limit_booking_loc`                      ='SG') 
    OR `all_f`.`w_datasource_id`                       <> 'BCRS_ND' )
    AND trim(NVL(`all_f`.`edm_limit_booking_loc`,'')) <> '' 
 )
 OR
 (
